markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Drover's Band](/Equipment.aspx?ID=927)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Abomination Vaults</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Incapacitation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=93" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 72</row>

**Price** 675 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn bracers

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This black leather wrist guard has a bright red gem on the inside of the wrist. Faint glyphs and words of domination in [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19) swim inside the gem. Your words become harsh and clipped when you have this magic item invested.

<document level="2" id="action-709" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Drover's Band
